President Sisi says Egypt will not allow any threat to Somalia or its securityEgypt will not allow any threat to Somalia or its security, President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi said on Sunday, according to a statement from the presidency, after Ethiopia said it would consider recognising an independence claim by Somaliland. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 12:00:52 GMT TRVRGHYB3JIQJLZYLDVNYMLTCU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/president-sisi-says-egypt-will-not-allow-any-threat-somalia-or-its-security-2024-01-21/Reuters世界非洲
UN's Guterres condemns Israel for 'heartbreaking' killings in GazaUnited Nations Secretary-General António Guterres on Sunday denounced Israel for the "heartbreaking" deaths of Palestinian civilians in Gaza and called it unacceptable to resist statehood for the Palestinian people. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 10:41:35 GMT 547SIXM5UFMRXFCVQ6AEBJQSGA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uns-guterres-condemns-israel-heartwriting-killings-in-gaza-2024-01-21/Elias Biryabarema世界中东地区
Two Russian nationals were passengers on jet which went missing over Afghanistan - TASSTwo Russian citizens were passengers on a charter flight bound for Moscow that disappeared over Afghanistan, Russia's state-run TASS news agency said on Sunday, citing a source "in the operational services". Sun, 21 Jan 2024 09:50:58 GMT P4XUBOLCCBOPRI3JUHWAUT4TJI https://www.reuters.com/world/two- Russian-nationals-were-passengers-of-jet-which-went-missing-over-afghanistan-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Russia takes village in Ukraine's Kharkiv region -defence ministryRussian forces have taken control of the village of Krokhmalne in Ukraine's Kharkiv region, Russia's Defence Ministry said on Sunday, and a Ukrainian military spokesman confirmed that Kyiv's forces had withdrawn. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 09:09:48 GMT C65GSB7DVBLE3I5ZHI325GLH2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-takes-control-of-village-kharkiv-region-defense-ministry-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Fire erupts at Russia's Novatek Baltic Sea terminal after suspected Ukrainian drone attackA fire broke out at a Baltic Sea terminal belonging to Novatek , Russia's largest liquefied natural gas producer, after a suspected Ukrainian drone attack, forcing the company to suspend some operations there. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:47:30 GMT 3DSJU442XZPM3I2D7JEJ6FUBHU https://www.reuters.com/world/four-erupts-Russian-novatech-baltic-sea-terminal-after-explosions-heard-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Twenty-five killed after Ukraine shells Russian-controlled city of Donetsk, officials sayUkrainian forces shelled a busy area where shops and a market are located, the mayor said. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:28:50 GMT F2SAU3F2MBPODI5FXNGGWE6QKE https://www.reuters.com/world/eight-killed-after-ukraine-shells-Russian-control-city-donetsk-mayor-2024-01-21/Reuters世界
Two die, four injured in Johannesburg building fireTwo people were killed and four were injured when fire engulfed a residential building in Johannesburg early on Sunday, city officials said, adding search and rescue operations were still underway. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:12:37 GMT FJZCR5O37FPFBI72PK7IKRSPWU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/two-die-four-injured-johannesburg-building-fire-2024-01-21/Reuters世界非洲
Fire at Novatek's terminal caused by explosions - Russia's RIA agencyA fire at a terminal of Russia's largest liquefied natural gas producer Novatek on the Baltic Sea was caused by two explosions, the state RIA news agency reported on Sunday, citing local officials. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 08:04:04 GMT TFGDKY3ECJK33IVIZVBSSTFNSE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/fire-novatex-terminal-caused-by-explosions- Russian-ria-agency-2024-01-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian flight carrying 6 disappears over Afghanistan; crash reportedRussian aviation authorities said the plane was a charter ambulance flight travelling from Thailand's Utapao Airport in Pattaya to Moscow via India and Uzbekistan on a French-made Dassault Aviation Falcon 10 jet. Sun, 21 Jan 2024 07:16:46 GMT DYJUR45N55PUXBWMWGYX3ZL3RQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/report-plane-crash-northern-afghanistan-badakhshan-province-police-2024-01-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ethiopians celebrate "Timket" festival that marks Jesus' baptismThousands of Ethiopian Orthodox followers gathered in the capital Addis Ababa on Friday and Saturday to celebrate Epiphany, also called Timket, a religious festival commemorating Jesus' baptism in the Jordan River.
